Name: azure_hypervvirtualprocessorutilization_average;azure_hypervvirtualprocessorutilization_count;azure_hypervvirtualprocessorutilization_maximum;azure_hypervvirtualprocessorutilization_minimum;azure_hypervvirtualprocessorutilization_total
Description: Total average percentage of virtual CPU utilization at one minute interval. The total number of virtual CPU is based on user configured value in SKU definition. Further filter can be applied based on RoleName defined in SKU.
